channel.title: Barrage on npcs, help me?
channel.description:
yeh, i can use blitz spells on npcs and burst, i think anywho, BUT how do i use barrage? my run servers like [code][client-1-marc]: npcIndex: 291 magicID: 12891 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-marc]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000[/code]
how can i make it so barrage spells can work on npcs >_<
ICE barrage atleast :/[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 08:14:44 PM[/size][hr]yeh please help? i wanna try for the most realistic mage i can get, and NPCs are part of it :/
